setContentTypeface(Map<Integer, String>) - Method in class com.github.irshulx.Editor
setup the fontfaces for editor content For eg: Map typefaceMap = new HashMap<>(); typefaceMap.put(Typeface.NORMAL,"fonts/GreycliffCF-Medium.ttf"); typefaceMap.put(Typeface.BOLD,"fonts/GreycliffCF-Bold.ttf"); typefaceMap.put(Typeface.ITALIC,"fonts/GreycliffCF-Medium.ttf"); typefaceMap.put(Typeface.BOLD_ITALIC,"fonts/GreycliffCF-Medium.ttf");
